titles.title: A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed sale to the Government of Bahrain of certain defense articles and services.
A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed sale to the Government of Bahrain of certain defense articles and services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Motion to discharge Senate Committee on Foreign Relations made. (Pursuant to the Arms Export Control Act of 1976).
Motion to discharge Senate Committee on Foreign Relations rejected by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 161.

bill.summary: This joint resolution prohibits the proposed sale of various weapons, ammunition, and related support services to the government of Bahrain, as described in Transmittal No. 18-20 sent to Congress on May 6, 2019.
